General.Name: Indian Metals & Ferro Alloys Limited
General.Description: Indian Metals and Ferro Alloys Limited produces and sells ferro chrome in India. The company also offers fly-ash bricks and low-density aggregates. It exports its products to Korea, China, Japan, and Taiwan. The company was incorporated in 1961 and is headquartered in Bhubaneswar, India.

2.Name: Mr. Prem  Khandelwal B.Com.(Hons), FCA, FCS, FICWA
2.Title: Chief GCS, CFO & Company Sec.

6.Name: Captain Deepak Kumar Mohanty
